name: 8 Guns Portals - On Google Play
description:
8 Guns Portals:

You are a adventurer that was called to explore and protect the kingdom from the threat of the 8 portals.

Action Shooter game with a new gameplay mechanics for Android mobile devices, featuring:

• RPG System with NPCs to interact, Quests and Upgrades;
• Different types of guns ;
• More than 80 different enemies;
• Epic bosses to defeat;
• Cool fantasy-style environments and scenarios;
• Over 60 levels available!

Offline | Without Ads

Download Link: Google Play | Amazon
